import React from 'react' function Rating(props) { const {rating, numReviews } = props; return (
{/* = 1 ? "fa-sharp fa-solid fa-star" : rating >= 0.5 ? "fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke" : "fa-sharp fa-solid fa-star" }> */} = 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' }/> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' }/> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' }/> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' }/> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 4.5 ? ) } export default Rating
